title: The Haunted Hotel: the Second Part, Chapters 6 and 7
description:
Phoebe reads a chapter a day of Wilkie Collins’ The Haunted Hotel: a Mystery of Modern Venice. Read along.


Our other shows are Criminal and This is Love.


Donate to Phoebe Reads a Mystery.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
